description: Tests whether the given impersonation role can impersonate a target user.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization where the impersonation role is defined.

parameters.name: ImpersonationRoleId
parameters.description: The impersonation role ID to test.

parameters.name: TargetUser
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization user chosen to test the impersonation role. The following identity formats are available: User ID: 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012 or S-1-1-12-1234567890-123456789-123456789-1234 Email address: user@domain.tld User name: user.

nested_items.name: Effect
nested_items.description: Effect of the impersonation role on the target user based on its rules. Available effects are ALLOW or DENY.

nested_items.name: MatchedRules
nested_items.description: A list of the rules that match the input and produce the configured effect.

nested_items.name: ImpersonationRuleId
nested_items.description: The ID of the rule that matched the input.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the rule that matched the input.
